alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Dawes; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 23 at 2:46PM CST until November 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Dawes County, Box Butte County and Morrill County. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Very cold temperatures are expected to be present on Friday and Friday night. Impacts to local agriculture, including the ranching community are possible as wind chills near or below zero will be present.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
